page.title: 13AMENITIES.
page.content: There is a daily milk delivery and a postal service each day excluding Sunday. Bread is delivered twice a week and fresh fish, fresh vegetables and fish and chips are available once a week. The mobile library visits the area twice a month. Two free weekly newspapers are delivered to every house in the area. Bishampton has a shop/post office, hairdressers and a public house. Public transport is limited to a once a week service to Pershore on market day and twice a week to Evesham Both services allow about two hours for shopping but the times are not generally convenient for people going to work. In addition to the school buses a daily bus service is provided for students of 16+ attending Evesham College of Further Education.
